data.name: N0va Desktop
data.detailed_description:
Simply click the desktop to wake Lumi up
Enjoy an immersive experience with a lovely companion that's always by your side!

Product Features


· Click on Lumi to wake her up and see her sparkling eyes
· Select from a variety of themes to suit any mood
· Switch between the latest featured gaming wallpapers with a single click

Download exclusive live wallpapers now and enjoy Lumi's company every day!

data.short_description: Simply click the desktop to wake Lumi up. Enjoy an immersive experience with a lovely companion that's always by your side!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (with Aero), Windows 10 (Windows 8 is currently unsupported)
  • Processor: 1.66GHz Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 746 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD 7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

movies.name: Come Play With Lumi's New Furry Friend
